transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good evening, Shweta ma'am. Ma'am, I am Shabhan from IndiaMART speaking.
Customer: Ji, ji, good evening.
Executive: How are you, ma'am?
Customer: Haan, I am fine. You tell me how are you?
Executive: I am good, I am good. Ma'am, I am seeing, I mean, we are running inactive for quite a long time on the platform.
Customer: Nahi, inactive bohot samay se toh nahi hai.
Executive: Haan, matlab almost seven days inactive hai. Jaise last meeting hamara hua tha, uske baad se thoda sa inactive rahe.
Customer: Toh kya reason hai ma'am uska?
Customer: Aisa koi reason nahi hai. Usme bohot jyada kuch aisa response nahi aata hai.
Executive: Okay, okay. Achha, matlab proper
Customer: Ye jo aapke isme se jo aate hai na lead aate hai na usme koi interested nahi rehta hai. Mujhe phone karna mujhe pasand nahi hai. Toh mai woh khol ke message toh bhej deti hu lekin woh phir mujhe contact nahi karte toh woh
Executive: Okay, okay. Abhi na ma'am, abhi agar ek baar aap app open kare na ma'am, ek na buylead aaya just abhi 40 minutes ago ka. Agriculture drone ka. Hoga aapke paas agriculture drone? 10 liter ki capacity hai.
Customer: Haan, hai na.
Executive: Haan. Ek baar dekhiye, ek baar open kijiye ma'am. Abhi just recently post kiya buyer ne.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Toh usko kholna padega. Ek minute khol kar rahi hu. Phone mein, phone mein khol lijiye, koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Nahi, phone mein toh nahi reh paata yaar.
Executive: Achha, laptop mein hai kya? Toh khol lijiye, koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Hmm, khol liya.
Executive: Hello. Ma'am, dekhiye left pe three lines par aap laptop mein open kara hai na? Toh buylead ek baar open kijiye, buylead.
Customer: Ji, open kar liya.
Executive: Dekhiye, ye aa raha hai na ma'am? Ye 8020 agriculture drone. Dikha aapko buylead?
Customer: 8020? Ye Paradik agricultural drone, Nayasik, aur jaisa Balaghat ka.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, nahi. Ye Pune, Maharashtra ka hoga.
Customer: Pune, Maharashtra. Haan, Pune, Maharashtra ka niche hai. Haan. Niche hai na? Finance bhi nahi karana hai. Might be possibility cash hi lenge ye full payment.
Executive: Nahi, par ye toh Maruti ka maang rahe hai. Maruti ka toh
Executive: Brand Maruti?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Achha, achha. Ma'am, dekhiye jaise kya hota hai IndiaMART na kisi brand ko promote nahi karta. Abhi hum dekh sakte hai, ek baar baat kar sakte hai kyunki kya hoga ma'am, actual requirement na buyer ki call pe pata lag jayega jab hum baat kar sakte hai. Kyunki just recently ye might be possibility aap ek baar call kare aapke brand specific ho. Rate bhi kam ho jab buyer ko same cheez agar kam rate mein mil jati hai toh preferred karne lag jata hai buyer. Deal left hone se achha toh ek baar baat kijiye na inse ma'am.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dikha na right side pe contact buyer now. Ek baar click karke baat kar lijiye abhi 40 minute pehle ki hai.
Customer: Ji. Kar sakte hai. Most kehne jitna kiya hai toh usme koi response aata nahi hai. Sab log aise hi matlab woh bol dete hai ki hum toh aise hi visit kiya tha humne.
Customer: Kharidne ka hamara koi intention nahi isliye mai jyada phir karti nahi hu.
Executive: Dekhiye ma'am, kya hota hai aap dekhiye online business hai bas aapko na thoda sa effort karna padega. But kya hai ma'am, ek do aapko bhi pata hai dekhiye hamara aisa toh product hai nahi ma'am 10,000, 20,000 ka. Costly product hai toh thoda sa time dena padega aur ek bhi deal nikalte hai aapko pata hai sara ROI nikal jata hai.
Customer: Nahi, woh theek hai aapki baat woh mai maan rahi hu ki costly product hai lekin jo aapke yaha jo aate hai na jo log aapke isme lead dikhate hai woh basically sirf visit karte hai aapke isko kuch information ke liye aur woh lead ban ke aa jata hai. Algorithm ek baar ek baar aapka achha achha. Ek baar inse baat kijiye ga aur mujhe na WhatsApp pe zarur bataiyega ma'am, theek hai? Ki kya inse response raha. Ji. Ek baar mai wait kar raha hu aapke response ka. Aap turant baat just recently theek hai ma'am?
Customer: Okay, okay, karte hai. Okay, thank you. Namaste.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inactive on the platform for a long time.

- Not getting proper responses from buyleads.

- Leads are just visiting for information.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested to check recent agriculture drone buylead.

- Suggested to contact buyer to know actual requirement.

- Explained benefits of online business and ROI.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact the buyer.

- Customer will update executive on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, agriculture drone, inactive, response
